attributes.action: Withdrawal from the EU and reintroduction of parliament as only law making body for the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Debate on wether the United Kingdom should withdraw from the EU and that parliament become the only truly elected body that creates laws for this country. To dictate out own policies in the best interest of this country and it's citizens, also give the UK public a vote on wether to withdraw completely or remain as part of the free trade aspect which was initially what the EU was for.
